jobDescription: About Bitdefender Bitdefender is a cybersecurity leader delivering best-in-class threat prevention, detection, and response solutions worldwide. Guardian over millions of consumer, enterprise, and government environments, Bitdefender is one of the industry’s most trusted experts for eliminating threats, protecting privacy, digital identity and data, and enabling cyber resilience. With deep investments in research and development, Bitdefender Labs discovers hundreds of new threats each minute and validates billions of threat queries daily. The company has pioneered breakthrough innovations in antimalware, IoT security, behavioral analytics, and artificial intelligence and its technology is licensed by more than 180 of the world’s most recognized technology brands. Founded in 2001, Bitdefender has customers in 170+ countries with offices around the world. For more information, visit https://www.bitdefender.com About The Job Bitdefender is a leader in security solutions and one of the best-known IT security brands. We re at the forefront of security innovation, and we’re looking for talented individuals to shape the future of our products, our company, and the industry as a whole. Our mobile apps are evolving to leverage cross-platform development using Flutter to enhance our agility and efficiency. At the same time, we continue to rely on the strength of native iOS development to ensure we deliver robust, secure, and high-quality experiences for our users on iOS platform. We are looking for a passionate Mobile Software Developer with expertise in iOS development to join our team and help us take on exciting challenges in security and mobile innovation. What We’re Looking For We’re seeking a creative and technology-driven individual with a solid programming background. You should be eager to learn, solve complex problems, and work in an Agile environment to deliver high-quality, high-performance mobile apps. Ideally, You Should Have: 2+ years of iOS development experience, with expertise in Swift and iOS development tools (Xcode IDE, Instruments, Simulators). Solid understanding of iOS frameworks, Swift Packages, and dependency management tools like CocoaPods. Experience working with RESTful APIs to connect apps to back-end services. A strong grasp of the full mobile development lifecycle and experience with the Apple distribution process. The ability to write unit and functional tests to ensure code quality and coverage. Good knowledge of multithreaded programming and algorithmic thinking. Familiarity with Agile methodologies and version control systems (e.g., Git). Strong communication skills and fluency in English. Bonus Points For: Experience with Flutter or other cross-platform development frameworks. A Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science or a related field. A portfolio of past projects (e.g., on GitHub, Bitbucket, or similar platforms). Knowledge of Android development or Kotlin. What You’ll Do: Contribute to our mobile app evolution, supporting both the native iOS codebase and our transition to cross-platform development using Flutter. Collaborate with the team to develop and enhance existing iOS apps, ensuring high performance, security, and usability. Help design and build new features and applications to complement Bitdefender’s mobile ecosystem. Work with Product Owners, UX designers, QA engineers, and other developers in an Agile Scrum environment. Continuously evaluate and implement new tools, frameworks, and technologies to improve the efficiency and effectiveness of our development process. What We Offer: A dynamic and exciting work environment in a leading cybersecurity company. Competitive benefits aligned with your performance and contribution. Opportunities for professional growth and involvement in cutting-edge projects.
